MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to complete a repair on an underground cable located outside 223 Glasgow Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.42am on Tuesday 3rd November 2020.
